## echo() function

Re-emit the last emitted value

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function echo<Data>({ timerTrigger, focusTrigger, onlineTrigger, triggers, }?: TriggerConfig): OperatorFunction<Data, {
    trigger: string;
    value: Data;
}>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  { timerTrigger, focusTrigger, onlineTrigger, triggers, } | [TriggerConfig](./ngx-query-state.triggerconfig.md) |  |

<b>Returns:</b>
